main_content.en: At Orange we try to make every students life easy and organized. Are you lost between what to practice and what to revise? What projects you need to tackle first?

main_content2.en: Sweat no more!! With Orange you can easily prioritize your work. Its your very own personal manager/coach that will help you organize your daily study load and help you meet your goals more quickly and efficiently!

signup_error.en: Could not sign you up at this time. Please try again later!

sign_up_success.en: Welcome {name} to Orange. Your trial period ends in 15 days. Sign in and begin your journey to success!

trial_expired.en: Your trial period has expired!! You can continue with our services for just 5 oranges per month!
